## Train / Build the model

```{r train}

train_text <- load_text(raw_text, nrows = 30000 )

bigrams <- build_ngram(train_text, 2)
bigrams[1:3]
length(bigrams)

bigram_freq <- unlist(bigrams, recursive = FALSE)
ngram_freq <- unnest(bigram_freq)

    
bigram_freq[1:10]

head(train_text, 3)

trigrams <- build_ngram(train_text, 3)
trigrams[1:3]
head(train_text, 3)

str(bigrams) 

```
